description: This file defines the layout component for a Qwik-based frontend application. It sets up the main structure of the app, including a TopBar, NoteList sidebar, and main content area with a slot for nested routes. It also includes server-side request handling with cache control.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main layout component including UI structure and state management.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles server-side GET requests to set cache control headers.
